content: अवहार्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be taken away or removed. {@--2@} Finable, punishable; <ls>Ms. 8. 198.</ls> {@--3@} What one is forced to restore or redeem; आधिश्चोपनिधिश्चोभौ न कालात्ययमर्हतः . अवहार्यौ भवेतां तौ दीर्घकालमवस्थितौ .. <ls>Ms. 8. 145.</ls> {@--4@} To be completed, {@--5@} Recoverable, redeemable.
